transcript: I compare myself every day to warm buff it him and Munger are like my heroes mostly because the way they lived life I have Buffett's net worth by age tracked and I have like mine tracked and I'm like all right just gotta stay above that line at the moment I am right now his world was different Warren didn't have Warren to learn from the more you learn about something the more you realize you don't know I think that if you have a tiny tiny subset of things that you are studying and a tiny subset of people you're comparing yourself to it's really easy to feel awesome about yourself
